name: function 11
function 12
Create payload for "update_config"
func:
var description = flow.get('description');

// Initialiser la description avec les valeurs rcupres via flow.get
description = {
    sample_project: flow.get("sample_project"),
    sample_id: flow.get("sample_id"),
    sample_uuid: "", // Si ce champ est gnr automatiquement, le laisser vide
    sample_ship: flow.get("sample_ship"),
    sample_operator: flow.get("sample_operator"),
    sample_sampling_gear: flow.get("sample_sampling_gear"),
    sample_concentrated_sample_volume: flow.get("sample_concentrated_sample_volume"),
    sample_total_volume: flow.get("sample_total_volume"),
    sample_dilution_factor: flow.get("sample_dilution_factor"),
    sample_speed_through_water: flow.get("sample_speed_through_water"),

    acq_id: flow.get("acq_id"),
    acq_uuid: "", // Si ce champ est gnr automatiquement, le laisser vide
    acq_instrument: flow.get("acq_instrument"),
    acq_instrument_id: flow.get("acq_instrument_id"),
    acq_celltype: flow.get("acq_celltype"),
    acq_minimum_mesh: flow.get("acq_minimum_mesh"),
    acq_maximum_mesh: flow.get("acq_maximum_mesh"),
    acq_min_esd: flow.get("acq_min_esd"),
    acq_max_esd: flow.get("acq_max_esd"),
    acq_volume: flow.get("acq_volume"),
    acq_imaged_volume: flow.get("acq_imaged_volume"),
    acq_magnification: flow.get("acq_magnification"),
    acq_fnumber_objective: flow.get("acq_fnumber_objective"),
    acq_camera_name: flow.get("acq_camera_name"),
    acq_nb_frame: flow.get("acq_nb_frame"),
    acq_local_datetime: flow.get("acq_local_datetime"),
    acq_camera_resolution: flow.get("acq_camera_resolution"),
    acq_camera_iso: flow.get("acq_camera_iso"),
    acq_camera_shutter_speed: flow.get("acq_camera_shutter_speed"),
    acq_software: flow.get("acq_software"),

    object_date: flow.get("object_date"),
    object_time: flow.get("object_time"),
    object_lat: flow.get("object_lat"),
    object_lon: flow.get("object_lon"),
    object_depth_min: flow.get("object_depth_min"),
    object_depth_max: flow.get("object_depth_max"),

    process_pixel: flow.get("process_pixel"),
    process_datetime: flow.get("process_datetime"),
    process_id: flow.get("process_id"),
    process_uuid: "", // Si ce champ est gnr automatiquement, le laisser vide
    process_source: flow.get("process_source"),
    process_commit: flow.get("process_commit"),

    sample_gear_net_opening: flow.get("sample_gear_net_opening"),
    object_date_end: flow.get("object_date_end"),
    object_time_end: flow.get("object_time_end"),
    object_lat_end: flow.get("object_lat_end"),
    object_lon_end: flow.get("object_lon_end")
};

msg.payload = {
    action: "update_config",
    config: {
        description: description,
        sample_project: flow.get("sample_project"),
        sample_id: flow.get("sample_id"),
        sample_ship: flow.get("sample_ship"),
        sample_operator: flow.get("sample_operator"),
        sample_sampling_gear: flow.get("sample_sampling_gear"),
        sample_concentrated_sample_volume: flow.get("sample_concentrated_sample_volume"),
        sample_total_volume: flow.get("sample_total_volume"),
        sample_dilution_factor: flow.get("sample_dilution_factor"),
        sample_speed_through_water: flow.get("sample_speed_through_water"),

        acq_id: flow.get("acq_id"),
        acq_instrument: flow.get("acq_instrument"),
        acq_instrument_id: flow.get("acq_instrument_id"),
        acq_celltype: flow.get("acq_celltype"),
        acq_minimum_mesh: flow.get("acq_minimum_mesh"),
        acq_maximum_mesh: flow.get("acq_maximum_mesh"),
        acq_min_esd: flow.get("acq_min_esd"),
        acq_max_esd: flow.get("acq_max_esd"),
        acq_volume: flow.get("acq_volume"),
        acq_imaged_volume: flow.get("acq_imaged_volume"),
        acq_magnification: flow.get("acq_magnification"),
        acq_fnumber_objective: flow.get("acq_fnumber_objective"),
        acq_camera: flow.get("acq_camera"),
        acq_nb_frame: flow.get("acq_nb_frame"),
        acq_software: flow.get("acq_software"),

        object_date: flow.get("object_date"),
        object_time: flow.get("object_time"),
        object_lat: flow.get("object_lat"),
        object_lon: flow.get("object_lon"),
        object_depth_min: flow.get("object_depth_min"),
        object_depth_max: flow.get("object_depth_max"),

        process_pixel: flow.get("process_pixel"),
        process_source: flow.get("process_source"),
        process_commit: flow.get("process_commit")
    }
};

return msg;
